title: All eligible hutment dwellers taking part in the SRS shall have to be rehabilitated in accordance with the provisions of this Regulation
clause_text: All eligible hutment dwellers taking part in the SRS shall have to be rehabilitated in accordance with the provisions of this Regulation. It may be in situ and in the same scheme as far as possible.

source_pdf.text_snippet: All eligible hutment dwellers taking part in the SRS shall have to be rehabilitated in accordance with the provisions of this Regulation. It may be in situ and in the same scheme as far as possible.
